title: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It
description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren are back to solve a chilling case involving a murder suspect who claims to have been possessed by a demonic entity.

title: Cruella
description: Witness the origin story of one of Disney's most iconic villains, Cruella de Vil, as she rises to become a notorious fashion designer with a penchant for Dalmatian fur.

title: A Quiet Place Part II
description: Following the events of the first film, the Abbott family must now face the terrors of the outside world as they continue their fight for survival in silence.
